scripts.db-check-logs: bun run query --dev --q "SELECT * FROM (SELECT query, args, DATE(date / 1000, 'unixepoch') as date, error FROM query_logs WHERE DATE(date / 1000, 'unixepoch') > '2024-09-15' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 100) ORDER BY date"
scripts.preview: bunx --bun --env-file='.env.production' astro build && wrangler pages dev ./dist
scripts.docker-pdf: docker build -f ./pdfWorker/local.Dockerfile -t pdfworker ./pdfWorker/ && docker run --network host -d pdfworker
scripts.docker-img: docker build -f ./imageCompression/local.Dockerfile -t imgcomp ./imageCompression/ && docker run --network host -d imgcomp
scripts.docker-build: docker build -f ./pdfWorker/local.Dockerfile -t pdfworker ./pdfWorker/ && docker build -f ./imageCompression/local.Dockerfile -t imgcomp ./imageCompression/
scripts.docker-run: docker run --network host -d pdfworker && docker run --network host -d imgcomp
scripts.docker-logs: docker logs -f $(docker ps -q --filter ancestor=pdfworker) && docker logs -f $(docker ps -q --filter ancestor=imgcomp)
